title: Focus’ new JAM, plus all-new THRON mountain bikes make trail rides playful again
content:
Two new alloy Focus JAM & THRON mountain bikes hope to make you feel like a kid again, bringing playtime back to trail rides. Stretching out what had been their previous generation trail bikes, the two affordable aluminum 29ers – 130mm trail Thron and 150mm all-mountain Jam – both promise playful riding from local singletrack […]

The post Focus’ new JAM, plus all-new THRON mountain bikes make trail rides playful again appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
